name: Alex Adventures
description:
Hey there. My name is Alex and this is my very first Game Jam I joined.

First of all: This game is not finished. This game is just a prototype of a jrpg game inspired by Dragon Quest Games. I appreciate anyone who is willing to test the early phase of this game but dont expect too much there. 

Some Buttons (like the Settings or Save Button) have no functions yet. On these I am working right now and will be added in futher updates. So this game has a level system but will be reset after restarting the game. 

Have fun testing!
